main event: Multiple witnesses observed a bright green object in the sky over various locations in New Mexico on 27 Sep 1960.
interesting points: The object was about half the diameter of the moon and initially high in altitude., It suddenly developed a tail and faded out of sight., Similar objects were reported in Las Cruces., Observations were made from multiple locations including Alamogordo and White Sands., Witnesses included civilians and military personnel.
sighted object: a bright green object with a developing tail
witness description: civilians and military personnel from the area
